books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The survivors of a shipwrecked British vessel on a secret mission during an imperial war with Spain have different accounts of events.
books.name: THE WAGER

books.author: by Peter Attia with Bill Gifford
books.description: A look at recent scientific research on aging and longevity.
books.name: OUTLIVE

books.author: by Michelle Obama
books.description: The former first lady shares personal stories and the tools she uses to deal with difficult situations.
books.name: THE LIGHT WE CARRY

books.author: by Matthew McConaughey
books.description: The Academy Award-winning actor shares snippets from the diaries he kept over the last 35 years.
books.name: GREENLIGHTS

books.author: by Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
books.name: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: by Michelle Zauner
books.description: The daughter of a Korean mother and Jewish American father, and leader of the indie rock project Japanese Breakfast, describes creating her own identity after losing her mother to cancer.
books.name: CRYING IN H MART

books.author: by Kat Timpf
books.description: The co-host of “Gutfeld!” and Fox News contributor gives her take on free speech and comedy.
books.name: YOU CAN'T JOKE ABOUT THAT

books.author: by Lucinda Williams
books.description: The Grammy Award-winning musician shares the hardships that informed her music.
books.name: DON'T TELL ANYBODY THE SECRETS I TOLD YOU

books.author: by Jennette McCurdy
books.description: The actress and filmmaker describes her eating disorders and difficult relationship with her mother.
books.name: I'M GLAD MY MOM DIED

books.author: by Prince Harry
books.description: The Duke of Sussex details his struggles with the royal family, loss of his mother, service in the British Army and marriage to Meghan Markle.
books.name: SPARE

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil.
books.name: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON

books.author: by Matthew Desmond
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning author of “Evicted” examines the ways in which affluent Americans keep poor people poor.
books.name: POVERTY, BY AMERICA

books.author: by Laura Dern and Diane Ladd
books.description: Conversations on personal subjects from a mother and daughter who are also award-winning actresses.
books.name: HONEY, BABY, MINE

books.author: by Timothy Egan
books.description: The Pulitzer and National Book Award-winning author details the Ku Klux Klan's rise to the height of its power in the 1920s and how one brutalized woman’s testimony diminished it.
books.name: A FEVER IN THE HEARTLAND

books.author: by Matika Wilbur
books.description: Photographs and interviews in celebration of the federally recognized Native American Tribal Nations.
books.name: PROJECT 562
